title: roles which has a specific interaction with every single individual role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, choose a player. The host will apply some unique negative effect to them based on their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your effects should not be able to "cover" any other roles that aren't almost exactly the same as your target's.
- Your effects should be more harmful than a frame but less than a Basic attack, roughly.
- You do not know what effect you apply.

desc:
Post 2821
*Needing one is a bit different than one being helpful*
